name: reporte-qa-notion
description: Generador de reportes QA con envío automático de emails desde Notion API

scripts.generate:daily: npm run build && node dist/index.js generate:daily
scripts.generate:weekly: npm run build && node dist/index.js generate:weekly
scripts.export:weekly-csv: npm run build && node dist/index.js export:weekly-csv
scripts.export:weekly-csv-custom: npm run build && node dist/index.js export:weekly-csv-custom
scripts.list:daily: npm run build && node dist/index.js list:daily
scripts.list:weekly: npm run build && node dist/index.js list:weekly
scripts.validate: npm run build && node dist/index.js validate

author: Lucas Zaracho
